class.name: DojoStruct
class.brief_description: Represents a struct from a Dojo contract.
class.description: This class holds the name and members of a struct from a Dojo contract. The members are stored as a dictionary in the [code]value[/code] property.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the struct.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the dictionary of members of the struct.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of the struct.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the dictionary of members of the struct.
